de.ovgu.wdok.guinan

Class GuinanThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • de.ovgu.wdok.guinan.GuinanThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

     class GuinanThread
extends java.lang.Thread
implements java.lang.Runnable
    a special thread class for GuinanMaster
    each registered connector will be queried in a different thread (for performance reasons)
    Author:
    Katrin Krieger

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        Constructor, taking 4 parameters
        Parameters:
        ags - the GuinanConnector running in the thread
        client - the client part sending requests to the connector
        q - the query string
        results - the ArrayList containing results returned from the connector (empty upon call of constructor)
